channel.title: Research on 激光诊断实验室
channel.description: Recent content in Research on 激光诊断实验室

item.title: Research in the Liu lab
item.description: Here at the advanced manufacotring and diagnostic equipment lab, we develop advanced laser diagnostic tools and study their application in reactive flow, for example plasma enhanced chemical vapor deposition and propulsion sector, for example high repetition rate laser based non-intrusive imaging technique to study the dynamics in aero engine test rig and shock tube.
